I love to code and love what I do.

Hello, I’m Roman. Nice to see you there.

Since i started fullstack developer careere, gained over 5 years development experience. I listen to the client and always try to find the best ways to solve the problem. Follow the principles of cleanliness and clarity of my work, as well as the convenience of support. From me you can expect agile results and ease of communication.
